snippet: Arizona hired the Oakland Athletics’ bench coach, Chip Hale, as its manager to replace Kirk Gibson.
abstract: Arizona Diamondbacks hire Oakland Athletics bench coach Chip Hale as their next manager.
lead_paragraph: Arizona hired the Oakland Athletics’ bench coach, Chip Hale, as its manager to replace Kirk Gibson.

headline.main: Diamondbacks Hire A’s Coach as Manager
headline.print_headline: Diamondbacks Hire A’s Coach Hale as Manager
